fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Interface DaoAccess<T extends ResourceRepresentation<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - A class derivated from ResourceRepresentation

    public interface DaoAccess<T extends ResourceRepresentation<?>>
    Interface which represents methods to implement for Database Access Object
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy
    See Also:
    ResourceRepresentation

      • findById

        <ID> T findById(ID resourceId)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method has to return the resource corresponding to the given ID. ID is a parametrized type corresponding to the ResourceRepresentation id field type
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource
        Returns:
        The resource corresponding to the given ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a sql error occurs

        A list of all the resources
        Throws:

      • deleteResource

        int deleteResource(T resource)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method has to delete the specified resource
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to delete
        Returns:
        Number of resource actually deleted (should be 1)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a sql error occurs

        Returns:
        Number of resource actually updated (should be 1)
